Text:
Hey you !
I've never seen your face around ! Are you new to this area ?
Are you a dungeon crawler ? What's your name ?
All right %player_name%, my name is Jeff and you'll need equiments first
Come and have a look to my items !
I want to buy this book
Oh my bad ! You are right it's 50 do you buy it ?
I want to buy this axe
Nice choice, this sturdy axe costs 50
How much for that sword cane ?
Oh ! You know how to distinguish good things, it's 70
